document.full_text: a hacker group has engineered yet another attack on the computer networks of sony corp, a setback to the japanese company's efforts to move past a security crisis that erupted in april.
document.title: hackers attack another sony network, post data
lines_and_colors: a hacker group has engineered yet another attack on the computer networks of sony corp, a setback to the japanese company's efforts to move past a security crisis that erupted in april.
